recipesJson.name: Suicidal
recipesJson.author: Chrisdvr1
recipesJson.description: When thrown into the arena with Satan's greatest demon, one can't help but consider the easy way out.

reviews.text: People will make less jokes about evil once they understand its actually real, and they are in hell forever. The life, death and resurrection of Jesus is historical fact. Ye must be born again. Mock me, but I'm born again and am going to live forever.
